title: COVID-19 Test Location Schema
description: Schema for providing information about testing locations

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

examples.additional-information-for-patients: We serve 280 small communities and villages. If you do not know which health center is nearest you, please call 907-465-3150 or toll-free 1-800-499-2964.
examples.location-name: State of Alaska Health And Social Services

location_id.title: Location ID
location_id.description: An unique identifier issued by Coders Against COVID - the organization responsible for maintaining this open source project.

is-location-authorized-to-request-testin.title: Is location authorized to request COVID-19 tests?
is-location-authorized-to-request-testin.description: TRUE: the location is authorized to request or ordering COVID-19 testing if, after reviewing symptoms and eliciting a relevant history, the person meets the eligibility requirements as per established criteria. FALSE: The location is unable or unwilling to serve this function.

is-location-collecting-specimens.title: Is location actively collecting specimens?
is-location-collecting-specimens.description: TRUE: the location has resources dedicated to the task of obtaining and submitting specimens for COVID-19 testing. Note that this does not consider how the decision to swab the patient is reached - merely whether the collection of specimens is actively taking place. It also ignores whether the specimens are tested in-house or as a send-out.

location-name.title: Location name
location-name.description: The name of the location could be an existing entity or a directional reference.
examples: State of Alaska Health And Social Services

location-address-street.title: Street address
location-address-street.description: The street address for the location, including any suite, unit, or floor designation.

location-address-locality.title: Locality
location-address-locality.description: The city, town, or village for the location.

location-address-region.title: Region
location-address-region.description: The state, province, or region for the location.

location-address-postal-code.title: Postal code
location-address-postal-code.description: The postal code for the location.

lat.title: Latitude
lat.description: The latitude code for the location.

location-place-of-service-type.title: Place of Service Type
location-place-of-service-type.description: The category or class of location.

location-contact-phone-main.title: Main phone number
location-contact-phone-main.description: The area code and phone number that persons should dial should they want to discuss anything OTHER THAN appointments for COVID-19-related services. This includes general information hotlines.

location-contact-url-main.title: Main URL
location-contact-url-main.description: The URL that is used for general information and FAQs. This EXCLUDES direct links to appointment scheduling or telehealth services.

location-hours-of-operation.title: Hours of operation
location-hours-of-operation.description: The hours during which persons can expect to receive services related to COVID-19.

is-location-accepting-third-party-orders.title: Is location accepting external requests for testing?
is-location-accepting-third-party-orders.description: TRUE: The location will collect and process specimens from individuals that where deemed to meet testing criteria by any entity with the authority to issue a request or order for COVID-19 testing. Note - This means that the entity issuing the request or order does not otherwise have an established relationship to the person or organization that is responsible for the clinical operations of this location.

is-location-only-testing-patients-that-m.title: Is location exclusively testing those who meet specific criteria?
is-location-only-testing-patients-that-m.description: TRUE: The location will collect and process specimens ONLY from individuals that are deemed to meet testing criteria. Note: this does not consider which criteria were met, nor does it consider how that determination was reached.

is-location-by-appointment-only.title: The Is-location-by-appointment-only Schema
is-location-by-appointment-only.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

location-contact-phone-appointments.title: The Location's appointments phone number
location-contact-phone-appointments.description: Leave null or empty if the location is not using these services to screen, diagnose, treat, or otherwise manage persons with confirmed, presumed, suspected, or concern for COVID-19

location-contact-url-appointments.title: The Location's appointments URL'
location-contact-url-appointments.description: Leave null or empty if the location is not using these services to screen, diagnose, treat, or otherwise manage persons with confirmed, presumed, suspected, or concern for COVID-19

location-contact-symptom-checker-url.title: The location's symptom-checker URL
location-contact-symptom-checker-url.description: Leave null or empty if the location is not using these services to screen, diagnose, treat, or otherwise manage persons with confirmed, presumed, suspected, or concern for COVID-19

location-contact-telehealth-url.title: The Location-contact-telehealth-url Schema
location-contact-telehealth-url.description: Leave null or empty if the location is not using these services to screen, diagnose, treat, or otherwise manage persons with confirmed, presumed, suspected, or concern for COVID-19

additional-information-for-patients.title: The Additional-information-for-patients Schema
additional-information-for-patients.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.
examples: We serve 280 small communities and villages. If you do not know which health center is nearest you, please call 907-465-3150 or toll-free 1-800-499-2964.
